constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 18/12636/HOU (Demolition of existing rear extension, erection of single storey rear extension and erection of a rear roof extension to facilitate a loft conversion) dated 02/10/2018. Amendment to consist of a flat roof with lantern style roof window instead of a sloping roof with 3no. rooflights
decision_conditions: Officers considers that the proposed changes are materially different to those approved under planning permission 18/12636/HOU. As such, the S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.
The applicant is reminded of its riparian obligations to work insofar as they are able to prevent anything being discharged or discarded into the Beverley Brook.
All applications that involve changes to the windows / doors of a building must provide Existing and Proposed Window / door Sections - please see the Validation Local List (page 18) for guidance.
